amendment.description: An amendment numbered 42 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to allow for admission of essential scientists and technical experts to promote and protect the national security innovation base.
amendment.purpose: Amendment allows for admission of essential scientists and technical experts to promote and protect the national security innovation base.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 187 (Roll no. 286).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A025) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Langevin.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 187 (Roll no. 286).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 187 (Roll no. 286).
